dcterms:creator: K. Kullawan
R. Bratvold
J. Bickel
dcterms:description: A decision optimization method that integrates the Bayesian framework with a multi-objectives, decision-driven approach to geosteering, focusing on real-time measurements and uncertainties relevant to the current decision-making stage.
dcterms:title: Kullawan et al. (2016a) Geosteering Context

dcterms:creator: K. Kullawan
R. Bratvold
J. Bickel
dcterms:description: A method that combines the Bayesian framework with Discretized Stochastic Dynamic Programming (DSDP) to support directional changes in geosteering operations, optimizing real-time well placement.
dcterms:title: Kullawan et al. (2018) Geosteering Context

dcterms:creator: H. Liu
D. Zhu
Y. Liu
A. Du
D. Chen
Z. Ye
dcterms:description: A synthetic study demonstrating the applicability of reinforcement learning in well-placement optimization, showcasing a 3D guided drilling method.
dcterms:title: Liu et al. (2018) Synthetic Study
